review:
Dr  Aman & Dr  Karuna provided such a smooth experience for my son who had to get his tooth extracted. He is usually scared of going to a dentist but it was a super easy visit for, him thanks to them. Dr. Aman & Dr. Karuna were super gentle with him. As parents they were able to resolve our worries and gave us enough information about everything.

Can't recommend them and Tooth Town enoughðŸ˜€
Itwas very nice experience with dr karuna. She is friendly, polite and very good. Will be going there again next week and would like to recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
